function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Unequal impact of covid-19 on different social classes, genders, and age groups","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Food insecurity and famine due to lockdowns and other crises","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Restriction of movement for essential medical personnel and supplies","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on digital technologies for epidemic monitoring and control","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High-speed network reliance for tracking strategic locations and infected patients","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Industry 4.0 and medicine 4.0 adoption","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Governments failing to prepare for the magnitude of the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Need for innovative and emerging technologies to combat the pandemic","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Surge demands for critical care facilities","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to provide protective gear and medical supplies","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Financial strain preventing industries from investing in iot","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on iot for operational continuity during pandemics or emergencies","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overworked hospital staff and overburdened facilities due to covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased reliance on remote collaboration and control in industrial iot may lead to greater spread of contagious diseases if not managed effectively.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate adoption of digital maintenance and automation in response to pandemics may result in operational disruptions and increased risk of disease transmission.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Changes in travel patterns and behaviors due to covid-19 may increase the risk of spreading contagious diseases in transportation networks.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of seamless integration of data from different sources may result in inaccurate or unreliable information being shared with travelers.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inefficiency and delays in logistics could lead to hoarding of supplies, social contact, and increased risk of exposure to contagious diseases during supply chain operations.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of data integration and data security could lead to compromised access control, potentially risking sensitive information.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased reliance on online services may lead to a reduced physical presence in brick-and-mortar stores, potentially impacting public health and safety.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of integration and analysis of customer behavior data may limit the effectiveness of ai, iot, and big data solutions in the retail and entertainment industry.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient integration of data leading to ineffective deployment of context-aware devices","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Shift in energy consumption from commercial buildings to homes due to covid-19 lifestyle changes","category":"Environmental
